body: At 5th level, a two-weapon warrior gains a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls when making a full attack with two weapons or a double weapon. This bonus increases by +1 for every four levels after 5th. This ability replaces weapon training 1.
name: Twin Blades
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Fighter/Fighter Archetypes/Two-Weapon Warrior/Twin Blades
